SEARCH
Package main.services

Class RegistrationService

java.lang.Object
main.services.RegistrationService
public class RegistrationService extends Object
Handles officer registration for BTO projects, including approval, cancellation, and file updates.

  • Constructor Summary

      projectService - service for project retrieval
      fileManager - file I/O manager

  • Method Details

    • register

      public boolean register(HDBOfficer officer, String projectId)
      Submits a registration request for the given officer and project.
      Parameters:
      officer - the officer requesting registration
      projectId - the project name
      Returns:
      true if registration was accepted, false otherwise

      projectName - the project name

    • getRegistrationByOfficer

      public Registration getRegistrationByOfficer(HDBOfficer officer, String projectName)
      Retrieves a registration entry for a given officer and project.
      Parameters:
      officer - the officer whose registration is being queried
      projectName - the name of the project associated with the registration
      Returns:
      the matching Registration object, or null if none found

    • handleOfficerRegistration

      public boolean handleOfficerRegistration(HDBManager manager, BTOProject project, HDBOfficer officer)
      Handles the approval of an officer's registration to a BTO project.

      This method performs validation checks, updates the officerâ€™s registration status, modifies the associated project, and writes the changes to the file system.

      Parameters:
      manager - the HDB manager performing the approval
      project - the project to which the officer is registering
      officer - the officer whose registration is to be approved
      Returns:
      true if registration is approved successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the officer's intended project does not match the given project

    • getRegistration

      public List<Registration> getRegistration()
      Returns the list of all officer registration records.
      Returns:
      list of Registration objects
